body: Hello, iRapGod here. Got a quick question for anyone here who relatively knows how to fish, what's the best way to catch catfish, and what's the best way to catch a bass?  Youtube videos would probably take too much time, so something as simple as "x bait works pretty well" or "this setup with this bait thjngy works good on x fish" is appriciated. Thanks!

title: Fishing Help!

replies.body:
patience is key


find hotspots from other fishers where they have seen/caught either catfish or bass oftenly.

replies.body: Catfish LOVE chicken liver. Hands down best bait to use.
